article.description: Diante Baldwin had 15 points and five assists to lead UNC-Greensboro to an 86-69 victory over Division III member Greensboro in the season opener for both teams on Saturday night.
article.headline: UNC-Greensboro beats Greensboro 86-69 in season opener
article.linkText: UNC-Greensboro beats Greensboro 86-69 in season opener
article.story: GREENSBORO, N.C. -- Diante Baldwin had 15 points and five assists to lead UNC-Greensboro to an 86-69 victory over Division III member Greensboro in the season opener for both teams on Saturday night. Baldwin was 6-of-10 from the floor. Clay Byrd scored 17 points, and Marvin Smith added 15 points with 9-of-11 shooting from the free-throw line. Kayel Locke, a preseason All-Southern Conference pick, added 10 points with six rebounds for the Spartans. Trevin Miller scored 13 points and grabbed seven rebounds to lead Greensboro. Christopher Corbin and Simeon Howard had 11 points apiece, and Donavan Griffith added 10 for the Pride. Miller made a layup to pull the Pride to 53-50 midway through the second half. A 10-3 surge stretched UNC-Greensboro's lead to 63-53 and the Spartans led by double digits the rest of the way.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
